explanations.machine learning: The paper discusses kernel-based regression methods and causal discovery algorithms, which are part of machine learning.
explanations.regression: The paper mentions solving real-world calibration and optimal stopping problems via classical kernel-based regression methods.
explanations.representation learning: The paper introduces higher order kernel mean embeddings (KMEs) that capture additional information related to the filtration, which can be seen as a form of representation learning for stochastic processes.
